tooltip.lasers.efficiency_upgrade.shift_: Reduces power consumption of the drill
tooltip.lasers.energy_storage_mk1.shift_: First iteration of the energy storage; stores 50kFE
tooltip.lasers.haste_upgrade.shift_down: Increases speed of the drill, but at the cost of increased power consumption
tooltip.lasers.sonar_upgrade.shift_down: Uses a percent of energy to scan the nearby area for ores
